codes: let output_len: usize = 3; // Sufficient output length for complete quads
decode_table[0x05] = INVALID_VALUE; // Set an invalid value for the last_byte
let output_len: usize = 2; // Insufficient output length for complete quads
decode_table[0x04] = INVALID_VALUE; // Last byte is valid since it is not 0x05
let output_len: usize = 3; // Sufficient output length
assert_eq!(result, Ok(4)); // Valid case should return Ok(4)
let input_len_rem = input.len() % 4; // This should be 0 for this input
let output_len = (input.len() / 4 * 3) as usize; // We can compute the expected output length
assert_eq!(result, Ok(input.len() - 1)); // As input_complete_nonterminal_quads_len must resolve to input.len() - 1
